short_summary: Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) requires the services of a Contractor to conduct an expenditure needs assessment of remunerations rates for treaty boards within jurisdiction and provide options and recommendations for new remunerations rates to be used by the Implementation Sector of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada.
description: Expenditure needs assessment, option and recommendation for remunerations rates for treaty boards
tags: Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada

# Request for Proposal

**Project Title**: Compensation Consultant for Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC)
## Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Reference Number**: PW-23-01025152
* **Publication Date**: February 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 23, 2023, at 13:00:00
## Contract Details
* **Contractor Requirements**: Provide consulting services to conduct an expenditure needs assessment for remuneration rates of treaty boards under the jurisdiction of CIRNAC
* **Duration**: Up to March 31, 2024
* **Level of Effort**: Approximately 52 days
## Contractor Selection Criteria
* No specific criteria have been provided for contractor selection.

[Download documents related to this project here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/23/44b07553e61b622be52ab79cf999142c/rfp_-_open_-_solicitation_1000248903-b_-_compensation_consultant-_amendment_1.pdf)

* **Contracting Entity**: Indigenous Services Canada
* **Contact Person**: Miriam Britel
* **Contact Email**: [miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: 873-355-2463
* **Contractor Address**: 10 rue Wellington, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0H4, Canada
